6549e4502ff7d850e0f497eef699b695 30 A classic mark of many Sentinels is their foresight and alertness.  From carefully scouting out the terrain and possible cover in likely combat locations to always watching for signs of ambush, they are rarely if ever caught unawares.  To their enemies, Sentinels appear to possess complete situational awareness, and always seem to be a step ahead of them.

Part of this is the intense preparation that Sentinels undergo before they conduct their crusades against injustice.  They often carry a wide variety of useful items on their persons, and always seem to have just the right device or piece of gear in their pockets or packs for the current situation.  With plans for any contingency readied and an unending vigilance, they can be the masters of almost any encounter.

BASE ABILITY

Once per game session at the beginning of a structured encounter, the character may spend 2 destiny points.  If he does so, he determines the initiative order of the first round of the encounter.  Character still make checks to determine initiative, but these results will only apply after Unmatched Vigilance's effects end.
